attributes.action: Keep Devonport Dockyard in Plymouth open and thriving
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Don't let Devonport Naval Base in Plymouth disappear.
It is a big part of Plymouth and affects everyone. The government have let the Royal Navy wither and shrink to almost nothing, we are a proud sea-going nation who must keep and protect all naval links and traditions.
KEEP DEVONPORT ALIVE not just because of the past, but for future generations.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
